name: Filipino (Bundle Sale)
description: Our favorite texture is now in a Bundle deal!

name: Filipino
description: Our Filipino texture is a Personal favorite! This texture is very soft and silky, at the same time very full! There is absolutely no Shedding or tangling.

name: Cambodian (Bundle Sale)
description:
* Each texture is 100% virgin human hair, each bundle is Double wefted ensuring no shedding, and the hair is carefully steamed not processed with chemicals.
Options include: Deep wave,body wave,straight, loose wave, and curly!
Strict quality procedures to ensure the BEST hair 

Cambodian texture is thick and lustrous, very versatile, and able to blend with all textures, but works best with a Thicker hair texture.

name: Indian Bundle Deal
description:
* Each texture is 100% virgin human hair, each bundle is Double wefted ensuring no shedding, and the hair is carefully steamed not processed with chemicals.
Options include: Deep wave,body wave,straight, loose wave, and curly!

Tangle free hair and Zero Shedding 
Strict quality procedures to ensure the BEST hair 

Indian texture is very soft at touch and very low maintenance. Very Natural Look and Feel. Has a light/thinner texture.

name: Malaysian
description:
* Each texture is 100% virgin human hair, each bundle is Double wefted ensuring no shedding, and the hair is carefully steamed not processed with chemicals.
Options include: Deep wave,body wave,straight, loose wave, and curly!

" Malaysian hair is the softest texture of them all, but also has a course texture. It's very bouncy and holds a curl greater than all other textures. This hair needs very little hair products to maintain it's great quality. Can be blended with all hair types, but blends the best with thicker hair textures.

name: Brazilian
description:
* Each texture is 100% virgin human hair, each bundle is Double wefted ensuring no shedding, and the hair is carefully steamed not processed with chemicals.
Options include: Deep wave,body wave,straight, loose wave, and curly!

" Brazilian hair is the most popular in the market! Brazilian hair is very silky, course, and lustrous. Blends very well with natural hair, it also can hold a good curl and is very versatile, making it easy to style and maintain! "
